name: kiota-vscode-extension
description: main package exposing Kiota CLI functionality to Typescript via npm and vscode extension

scripts.lint: npm run lint --w="@microsoft/kiota" && npm run lint --w=kiota
scripts.build: npm run build --w="@microsoft/kiota" && npm run build --w=kiota
scripts.test:vscode: npm run build && npm run test --w=kiota
scripts.test:vscode:coverage: npm run build && npm run test:coverage --w=kiota
scripts.test:package: npm run build --w="@microsoft/kiota" && npm run test --w="@microsoft/kiota"
scripts.test:package:coverage: npm run build --w="@microsoft/kiota" && npm run test:coverage --w="@microsoft/kiota"
scripts.test: npm run test:package && npm run test:vscode
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:package:coverage && npm run test:vscode:coverage

author: Microsoft
